description.summary: A serene web design template featuring a Zen garden aesthetic with a prominent lotus flower integrated with a structured layout for content presentation.
description.visual_style: A harmonious blend of natural imagery and structured digital elements, with a calming color scheme anchored by muted greens and accented by vibrant florals.
description.emotional_impact: Creates a peaceful, contemplative atmosphere through the use of natural imagery, soft color transitions, and balanced spacing.
description.compositional_elements: Two-column layout with a header featuring nature photography, a prominent flower element overlaying the header, and clearly defined content sections with ample white space.

artistic_context.style_influences: Japanese garden aesthetics, minimalist web design, nature-inspired digital art
artistic_context.visual_metaphors: Blooming flower suggesting growth and enlightenment, water elements conveying tranquility and flow
